Documentation for datastorewrapper¶

Contents:

datastorewrapper.configure_datastore(configuration, overwrite=True)[source]¶

Configures datastore by writing to ~/.bdkd_datastore.conf

Parameters:
  • configuration – dictionary representing configuration
  • overwrite – whether to overwrite any existing configuration (defaults to True)
Returns:

True if configuration was succesful
datastorewrapper.clear_config()[source]¶

Deletes ~/.bdkd_datastore.conf

class datastorewrapper.Datastore[source]¶

Represents Datastore. Attempts to connect to datastore-util on initialisation. Throws DatastoreError if unable to do so.

files(repository, dataset)[source]¶

Get all files from dataset and make them available locally

Parameters:
  • repository – name of the repository
  • dataset – name of the dataset
Returns:

list of paths of locally cached files
get(repository, dataset)[source]¶

For a given dataset in a repository, get all metadata and list of contents

Parameters:
  • repository – name of repository
  • dataset – name of dataset
Returns:

dictionary containing list of files and all metadata
get_repositories()[source]¶

Get list of configured Datastore repositories :returns: list of strings of datastore repository names

list(repository)[source]¶

Lists contents of given Datastore repository

Parameters:repository – name of repository to list
Returns:list of strings representing files in datastore
